duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and sustain manufacturing processes utilizing cutting edge technologies to achieve micron level tolerances in precision machining, specifically turning.
Continuous improvement utilizing Lean Tools to analyze and optimize manufacturing processes to improve efficiency, reduce cycle times, and minimize waste and defects.
Root cause analysis and corrective action implementation.
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including machinists, product support operators, engineers, and management.
Maintain a commitment to a safe working environment and ensure compliance with all relevant safety regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus.
Experience with Advanced Metrology techniques and knowledge of various CNC machine controls and programming languages is desirable.
Familiarity with RF, microwave, and mm-wave applications is desired.
Knowledge of CAM software such as Mastercam, SolidCAM, or similar is a plus.
